dc_title_s: Charter School Preference Boundaries: Chicago, Illinois, 2018-2019
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: Chicago Public Schools - Charter School Preference Boundaries SY1819
dc_description_s: This dataset defines preference boundaries for selected charter schools in the Chicago Public Schools district for school year 2018-2019. As opposed to elementary or high school attendance boundaries wherein each residing student is entitled to attend, charter boundaries simply serve as a guide for charter school administrators to use during the application/lottery process. Applicants residing within a specific boundary are generally given preference over applicants residing outside of the boundary.
